eeta mahendra sin doni nodawi lakunu 63 kda, subramaniyam badrinath lakunu 55 k ha murali wije lakunu 35k ek kalaha.pandu yawimedi irfan pathan, warun aaron ha ajith agakar eka kadulla bagin dawa gathha.pilithuru inima krida kala dilli deyar dewils pilata oowara 20 thuladi kadulu 6 k dawi raskara gatha haki wuye lakunu 158 k pamani.eeta infan pathan nodawi lakunu 44 k, wenu gopal raoo lakunu 30 k ha naman ooja lakunu 25k ha dewid wonar lakunu 21 k ek kalaha.pandu yawimedi rawi chandran ashwin lakunu 19 kata kadulu 2 k ha dwen brawo lakunu 21 kata kadulu 2 k da dawa gathha.tharagaye wiraya sammanaya mahendra sin donita himiwiya.chennayi supar kings pila kadulu 4 k dawi (oowara 20) 176mahendra sin doni (nodawi) 63, subramaniyam bradinath 55, murali wije 35 (warun aaron 20/1, irfan pathan 40/1, ajith agakar 49/1)dilli deyar dewils pila kadulu 6 k dawi (oowara 20) 158irfan pathan (nodawi ) 49, wenugopal raoo 30, naman ooja 25, dewid wonar 21(rawi chandran ashwin 19/2, dwen brawo 21/2).
